metadata.intent: Unify the 72-fold angelic and infernal teachings into a trauma-aware study of balance and reconciliation.
metadata.narrative: Node 072 houses a research cloister dedicated to mapping every 72-fold tradition into practical creative experiments.
metadata.safety_notes: ND-safe sanctuary: no motion, low luminance, clear exits, offline resources only.

angelic_names.description: Maps Shem angel names to infernal counterparts and virtues for reconciliation work.

i_ching.description: Hexagram triads aligned with 8×9 harmonic lattice for meditative sequencing.

geometry_patterns.description: Layer manifest referencing vesica grid, Tree paths, Fibonacci arc, and helix lattice anchors.

botanical_allies.description: Calming botanicals with 72 petal or leaflet structures for altar placement.

vesica.notes: Uses 9×7 lattice = 63 circles, doubled for vesica overlay while staying under the 144 calm threshold.

tree_of_life.notes: Ten sephirot rendered with radius = min(width, height) / 33 to honor numerology.

fibonacci.notes: Static spiral with 99 segments for smoothness and ND-safe pacing.

helix.notes: Double-strand helix with 144 segments, crossbars every 11 steps for 13 groups (approx.), referencing the cosmic bridge.

analysis.label: 72-Name Concordance Matrix
analysis.description: Cross-index the 72 Shem names with hexagram triads and infernal lessons for study notes.

analysis.label: Harmonic Resonance Calculator
analysis.description: Computes ratio relationships (3/6/9/12/18/24) for aligning sacred geometry to sound intervals without audio playback.

creative.label: Vesica Overlay Kit
creative.description: Places botanical emblems on vesica intersections; exports layered SVG without flattening.

creative.label: Helix Storyboard
creative.description: Assigns narrative beats to helix crossbars for journaling or static storyboard creation.

experiment_playbooks.title: Balance Weave Triptych
experiment_playbooks.purpose: Create a three-panel study card balancing angelic virtue, infernal teaching, and hexagram guidance.
steps: Select an angelic/infernal pair using the concordance matrix.
Pull the matching hexagram triad from the I Ching set.
Lay the trio onto vesica intersections with the overlay kit.
Export the panels as JSON metadata plus a static PNG snapshot.
experiment_playbooks.egregore_prompt: Ask the Fool to highlight which insight bridges the two extremes.

experiment_playbooks.title: Vesica Palette Cartography
experiment_playbooks.purpose: Map calming color harmonies across the vesica grid using botanical allies.
steps: Load vesica geometry with radius ratio 0.48 and 9×7 layout.
Use harmonic calculator to derive triadic color ratios (3:6:9).
Assign botanical emblems to intersections matching their petal counts.
Export the layout as a layered SVG, preserving depth.
experiment_playbooks.egregore_prompt: Invite the Bridge Custodian to approve the color gate.

experiment_playbooks.title: Helix Songline Grid
experiment_playbooks.purpose: Generate a rhythmic study grid (72 beats) aligned to helix crossbars for chant or breath pacing.
steps: Mark 72 positions along the helix storyboard using crossbars at every 11 steps.
Group beats into 3 × 24 phrases for balanced pacing.
Document breath/chant cues in Markdown for offline reading.
Optionally export beat markers as CSV for external tools (no playback).
experiment_playbooks.egregore_prompt: Consult the Fool for pacing guidance before practice.

la_00.prompt: Guide the traveler across the 72-fold bridge with curiosity and care.
la_00.reflection_question: Which rung on the helix feels steady, and which needs tending?
la_00.closing_grounding: Name three calm sensations, thank the custodians, close the notebook.

bridge_custodian.prompt: Audit the balance between angelic virtues and infernal lessons in today’s weave.
bridge_custodian.reflection_question: What practical repair can be made before moving to the next experiment?
bridge_custodian.closing_grounding: Touch the grounding stone, breathe for nine counts, record the insight.

offline_notes.palette_fallback: Use ND-safe palette from data/palette.json when custom colors are absent.
offline_notes.safety: Limit sessions to 72 minutes max, insert breaks every 9 minutes, and close with grounding prompts.
offline_notes.journal_template: Start entries with date, selected angelic/infernal pair, hexagram, and closing reflections.

status_messages.dataset_missing: Node 072 dataset missing; load defaults and surface calming notice.
status_messages.palette_missing: Palette missing; revert to ND-safe defaults and log fallback use.
